comment.author: 63073727@N06
comment._content: where do i turn to buy a print of this? kind regards

comment.author: 48220291@N04
comment._content: The easiest way to get high resolution copies of the material from the National Library of Norway, is to send an email to: billedsamlingen@nb.no You will also find high resolution copies of a selection of our polar material everyone can use free of charge here: www.nb.no/nbdigital/polarbilder/

comment.author: 63073727@N06
comment._content:
Thank you, very kind!
Best regards, f
